Package Map

Class Map.Territory

  • java.lang.Object
    • Map.Map.Territory
  • Enclosing class:
    Map
    public static class Map.Territory
extends java.lang.Object
    This inner class is used to create a Map. It adds the behavior of territories to the map, where each territory has a name, belongs to a continent and has a list of neighbours

        public void addNeighbours​(java.lang.String neighbourList)
        This method is used to add neigbours of a territory.
        Parameters:

      • assignContinent

        public boolean assignContinent​(java.lang.String continentName)
        This method is used to assign continent to a territory.
        Parameters:
        continentName - A String value of the continent name
        Returns:
        true if the continent is assigned otherwise returns false
